languages.text: "Их воины напали на нас в самый темный час — когда мой народ рассеялся средь звезд, скрываясь с гибнущего мира-корабля". {n}Эльдар вздергивает голову, и вы чувствуете переполняющую его энергию... однако ощущение тут же пропадает, а {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} хватается за голову с болезненной гримасой.{/n} "Кей-морагх... опыты гемункула подорвали мои силы..."

traits.locale_text: "Их воины напали на нас в самый темный час — когда мой народ рассеялся средь звезд, скрываясь с гибнущего мира-корабля". {n}Эльдар вздергивает голову, и вы чувствуете переполняющую его энергию... однако ощущение тут же пропадает, а {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} хватается за голову с болезненной гримасой.{/n} "Каэ-морагх... опыты гемункула подорвали мои силы..."

languages.text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."
languages.original_text: "Их воины напали на нас в самый темный час — когда мой народ рассеялся средь звезд, скрываясь с гибнущего мира-корабля". {n}Эльдар вздергивает голову, и вы чувствуете переполняющую его энергию... однако ощущение тут же пропадает, а {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксенос{/g} хватается за голову с болезненной гримасой.{/n} "Кей-морагх... опыты гемункула подорвали мои силы..."

traits.locale_text: "Their warriors attacked us at our darkest hour, when my people had fled a dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel his overflowing energy... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-moragh... The Haemonculos's experiments have taken all my strength away..."

"Their warriors attacked us at our darkest hour, when my people had fled a dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel his overflowing energy... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-moragh... The Haemonculos's experiments have taken all my strength away..."

"Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

"Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

"Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

languages.text: «Sus guerreros nos atacaron en nuestra hora más aciaga, cuando mi gente había huido de nuestro mundo astronave moribundo y se había dispersado por las estrellas». {n}El Aeldari levanta el mentón, y notas la energía que irradia su cuerpo... pero la sensación se disipa cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se agarra la cabeza con una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Kae-morag... Los experimentos del hemónculo me han despojado de mi fuerza...».
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: «Sus guerreros nos atacaron en nuestra hora más aciaga, cuando mi gente había huido de nuestro mundo astronave moribundo y se había dispersado por las estrellas». {n}El Aeldari levanta el mentón, y notas la energía que irradia su cuerpo... pero la sensación se disipa cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} se agarra la cabeza con una mueca de dolor.{/n} «Kae-morag... Los experimentos del hemónculo me han despojado de mi fuerza...».

languages.text: 「奴らの戦士どもは窮地の時に我々を攻撃した。人々が崩壊しかけていた方舟から脱出し、星々へ散り散りになった時にな」{n} アエルダリが顎を上げると、あなたは彼からエネルギーが放射されているのを感じたが…{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ゼノ{/g}が苦痛の表情を浮かべて頭を抱え込むと、その感覚はすぐに消えた。 {/n}「カエ＝モラグ…ハモンキュラスの実験が私の力を奪ってしまった…」
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らの戦士どもは窮地の時に我々を攻撃した。人々が崩壊しかけていた方舟から脱出し、星々へ散り散りになった時にな」{n} アエルダリが顎を上げると、あなたは彼からエネルギーが放射されているのを感じたが…{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ゼノ{/g}が苦痛の表情を浮かべて頭を抱え込むと、その感覚はすぐに消えた。 {/n}「カエ＝モラグ…ハモンキュラスの実験が私の力を奪ってしまった…」

languages.text: “他们的战士在我们最绝望的时刻袭击了我们。当时，我的族人逃出了我们垂死的方舟世界，四散在群星之间。”{n}先知抬起下巴，你感觉到了他散发出的能量……但随后，眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}突然露出痛苦的表情，紧紧捂住了头，他的能量也立刻消散了。{/n}“该死……血伶人的实验夺走了我的力量……”
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: “他们的战士在我们最绝望的时刻袭击了我们。当时，我的族人逃出了我们垂死的方舟世界，四散在群星之间。”{n}先知抬起下巴，你感觉到了他散发出的能量……但随后，眼前的{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}突然露出痛苦的表情，紧紧捂住了头，他的能量也立刻消散了。{/n}“该死……血伶人的实验夺走了我的力量……”

languages.text: « Leurs guerriers nous ont attaqués dans nos heures les plus sombres, alors que mon peuple venait de fuir notre vaisseau-monde mourant pour se disperser parmi les étoiles. » {n}L'Aeldari lève le menton et vous sentez l'énergie qui émane de lui... Mais la sensation disparaît aussitôt que le {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} porte les mains à sa tête avec une grimace de douleur.{/n} « Kae-morag... Les expériences de l'hémoncule m'ont privé de ma force... »
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: « Leurs guerriers nous ont attaqués dans nos heures les plus sombres, alors que mon peuple venait de fuir notre vaisseau-monde mourant pour se disperser parmi les étoiles. » {n}L'Aeldari lève le menton et vous sentez l'énergie qui émane de lui... Mais la sensation disparaît aussitôt que le {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g} porte les mains à sa tête avec une grimace de douleur.{/n} « Kae-morag... « Les expériences de l'hémoncule m'ont privé de ma force... »

languages.text: "Ihre Krieger griffen uns in unserer dunkelsten Stunde an, als mein Volk von unserem sterbenden Weltenschiff floh und sich in den Sternen vertreute." {n}Der Aeldari hebt sein Kinn und du spürst, wie Energie von ihm ausströmt ... aber die Empfindung verschwindet unmittelbar, als sich der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} an den Kopf fasst und dabei ein schmerzverzerrtes Gesicht zeigt.{/n} "Kae-morag ... Die Experimente des Haemonculus haben mir meine Kräfte genommen ..."
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: "Ihre Krieger griffen uns in unserer dunkelsten Stunde an, als mein Volk von unserem sterbenden Weltenschiff floh und sich in den Sternen vertreute." {n}Der Aeldari hebt sein Kinn und du spürst, wie Energie von ihm ausströmt ... aber die Empfindung verschwindet unmittelbar, als sich der {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g} an den Kopf fasst und dabei ein schmerzverzerrtes Gesicht zeigt.{/n} "Kae-morag ... Die Experimente des Haemonculus haben mir meine Kräfte genommen ..."

languages.text: "Ölümün kıyısındaki gemidünyamızdan kaçan halkımın yıldızlar arasında savrulduğu o en zor günlerimizde savaşçıları bize saldırdı." {n}Aeldari çenesini kaldırıyor. Ondan yayılan enerjiyi hissediyorsun fakat bu his... {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zenonun{/g} yüzünü ekşiterek başını avuçlarının arasına almasıyla birlikte yok oluyor.{/n} "Kae-morag... Haimonkulus'un deneyleri, bende takat bırakmadı..."
languages.original_text: "Their warriors attacked us in our darkest hour, when my people had fled our dying craftworld and scattered among the stars." {n}The Aeldari raises his chin, and you feel the energy radiating from him... but the sensation disappears at once as the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} clutches his head with a grimace of pain.{/n} "Kae-morag... The Haemonculus's experiments have robbed me of my strength..."

traits.locale_text: "Ölümün kıyısındaki gemidünyamızdan kaçan halkımın yıldızlar arasında savrulduğu o en zor günlerimizde savaşçıları bize saldırdı." {n}Aeldari çenesini kaldırıyor. Ondan yayılan enerjiyi hissediyorsun fakat bu his... {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Zeno{/g}nun yüzünü ekşiterek başını avuçlarının arasına almasıyla birlikte yok oluyor.{/n} "Kae-morag... Haimonkulus'un deneyleri, bende takat bırakmadı..."
